{{Actor| | type = Map spot | name = Sector Action: "Actor Leaves Sector" | class = SecActExit | doomednum = 9997 }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SectorAction|SectorAction]]→SecActExit
This is a ZDoom-specific thing that triggers its special when an actor leaves the sector it is present in. The following [[actor flags]], if set, control the trigger-ability of the ''thing'': *'''{{Flag|AMBUSH}}''' → [[monster]]s can trigger the special. *'''{{Flag|DORMANT}}''' → [[projectile]]s can trigger the special. *'''{{Flag|FRIENDLY}}''' → [[player]]s cannot trigger the special. *'''{{Flag|STANDSTILL}}''' → the special will be triggered only once. See also: [[Thing executed specials]] ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SecActExit : {{Class|SectorAction}} native {}
